website_summaries.verdict: Excellent price point for such a large screen. Monitor stand allows for adjustable height and tilt.
pros: Easy to use monitor that fits in a desirable price point
Can create a split screen that fits well on the wide screen
Good color accuracy, screen sharpness, and brightness
Extremely large screen at 34", measured diagonally
cons: Top end limited to full HD resolution at 21:9 aspect ratio of 2560 x 1080

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt the best priced monitor available right now.
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this monitor for my home. I do a fair bit of music production and needed some extra real estate for the screen. Did a ton of research going into the purchase. I fell in love with a that a friend of mine owns. The dell was priced about 700. This is an insane bang for your buck price. I came across this one online and and had great specs for the price. I purchased the monitor 5 months ago. I love it so much I purchased a second one for work. It has become my go to for everything I do. It easily stands up to monitors twice this price. 10/10 will buy a third soon.
customer_reviews.author: am_123654

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor&Stand/Gamers Need DisplayPort Cable
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate colors and it is great to have a large monitor at a respectable price. Also, the stand is easy to adjust and hard to move. Freesync and 75 hz are great to take advantage of, but after a firmware update you need a DisplayPort cable sold separately. If you are using this for gaming you have to have a DisplayPort cable because they only give HDMI. Also, I had to return my monitor due to dead pixels so there may be shaky quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Forest Krueger

customer_reviews.title: A bargain!
customer_reviews.text: The Pros: - It's cheap.If you want to try a wide monitor, consider this one! - The picture is not bad. Text is crisp, and I've used higher DPI monitors. - The audio jack means you only need one line into your PC. The Cons: - I wish it was a bit brighter. It's by no means dim though. - It doesn't swivel. - It seems like every audio frequency resonates with the speaker cover, which creates a buzzing sound. - This monitor is setup in my bedroom. When the monitor is off, but still has power, the power button blinks brightly. This is irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Work
customer_reviews.text: i bought this monitor to effectively serve as a dual monitor setup for my work and it's working out perfect. i use half of the screen for one program and the other for something else. i read a lot of reviews where people were concerned with text clarity and i can honestly say that i have zero issue with text clarity. everything looks great, monitor is bright , sound is good, no complaints. great value across the board
customer_reviews.author: Steven Strom

customer_reviews.title: Great ultra-wide at a great price.  Works seamlessly with Linux / Ubuntu 16.04.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting an ultra-wide monitor for a while and there was a lightning deal I couldn't pass up. Since I was doing a new Linux / Ubuntu build with a Ryzen 7 1800x and other great stuff, I decided to treat myself and do the new build justice with this monitor. I'm a developer and having the horizontal real estate for my IDE helps with productivity and keeping everything in sight without scrolling. I'm using this as a center monitor in a three monitor setup (the side monitors are LG's as well; 27" 1080p). Although this is not a curved monitor, it doesn't really affect the experience.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Seaton

customer_reviews.title: Two years later... it's terrible
customer_reviews.text: First off I will say I really liked this product both for its performance and its price point for a year and a half after I bought it. Then it started with display issues and now it's almost totally unusable most of the time. This is not a video card issue or a cable issue. I have replaced both. If I take a screenshot the picture is fine but what I see is not. Attached are pictures of what I see. There are periods where it clears up for a little while then degrades back to this. Turning off the monitor for a long time has no effect. Very disappointed in LG.
customer_reviews.author: Brion P. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: This is generally a fine monitor. Mine arrive in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: This is generally a fine monitor. Mine arrive in perfect condition, no dead pixels, etc. It is relatively light and it is very easy to install the base. Unfortunately, I decided to return mine. The monitor is excellent for movies and games. However, for word processing and business application there is a minor problem. When I sat in a position to view the middle of the monitor, there was some distortion at the sides. If I moved to the side, clarity of the letters improved. I would recommend this monitor for games and videos. For me, the inability to see crisp text across the whole screen led to returning it. My problem might be solved with a curved 34" screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Pavlov

customer_reviews.title: Very nice monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took me maybe 15 min. to assemble the stand and another 15 to install correct drivers,switch to FreeSync and bump up my refresh rate to 75Hz.Monitor's color's are vibrant and the wide screen is a pleasure to look at coming from a 32' LED TV I used for gaming from 2014. Now it's gonna be a fun night playing Devil May Cry lol. I'd recommend this monitor to anybody who doesn't have a lot of cash but wants a quality product that will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Robert M. Tomczyk

customer_reviews.title: Almost unusable.
customer_reviews.text: The monitor flickers on and off constantly. Not just a second, but stays off for 15+ seconds at a time.. consistently throughout the entire length that it is being used. It is not my cables or what I am plugging it into as I have tried various cables and alternate computers to test. This has been happening since the very first day I got this monitor. I completely regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Display
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised with the performance of this affordable version of the 21:9 concept from LG, color accuracy and bright are hard to equal when compared to other offers in the market. The increase in productivity is significant, both in office related applications as well as in media and contain creation. When movies are available in the 21:9 format (like some in the Amazon Prime Video collection) the viewing experience is immersive and delightful, this same applies to games. It is my hope that developers embrace a higher commitment with 21:9 display format soon, specially those working in the interactive entertainment industry.
customer_reviews.author: South_DL

customer_reviews.title: This Monitor Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Super large - extra wide field of view. Picture quality is excellent for general office work (MS Word, Excel, PPT, video conferencing, web surfing, etc.). I am particularly love the ability to partition the screen into multiple screens to allow separate windows for different programs and applications at the same time. I tend to use two most of the time, but you can create more than 8 separate windows. Sound quality of speakers is great for business use and background music. Not Bose quality, but don't expect it to be. However, speakers are more than loud and rich enough for conference calls and music, etc. For office use, this checks all the boxes. Very nice monitor.
customer_reviews.author: LivnFit

customer_reviews.title: ... monitor about a year ago and it is simply amazing. It has worked flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor about a year ago and it is simply amazing. It has worked flawlessly. I love the color reproduction, the brightness, the sharpness. I play games on it and it has very low latency. I love how wide it is for writing code. I am much more efficient than sitting at my desk at work with my lame old monitors. I think the 4k would have been awesome, but it probably isn't necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Stone

customer_reviews.title: No packaging for the monitor, at all
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing monitor, great brightness, awesome response, looks killer. I have absolutely no issues whatsoever regarding the monitor. The reason for one star is I received this on my doorstep with no additional packaging. Just the product box. Had I not been home, a very 'loud' box screaming "new high end gaming monitor" would have been left on my porch for multiple hours before I got home. I wasn't happy. The monitor itself is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam larson

customer_reviews.title: Great for increasing productivity
customer_reviews.text: The wide aspect ratio and higher resolution really increases the available desktop space within Windows 10. I can have four documents open, side-by-side, at the same time and move back-and-forth between them easily. The amount of adjustability in the stand is excellent. No need to worry about tilting my neck back so my bifocals work! The stand has plenty of adjustments to make sitting at my desk and using the monitor very comfortable. I’m using the recommended resolution which makes the text crisp and the screen brightness very comfortable. The built-in speakers are surprisingly clear and loud. I am very happy with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: David McLees

customer_reviews.title: 18 Month Life
customer_reviews.text: This was a good monitor with a great picture and ok sound quality. The price was decent too. However, 18 months after I purchased it, it simply stopped powering on. I tried the obvious fixes but apparently I just got a lemon. Tried to contact support but they informed me that the it was out of warranty (12 months). I’ve always been used to getting 5 years or more out of a monitor so just beware that they obviously don’t use the best materials/quality practices during manufacturing. So just know that you are rolling the dice on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Greenlee

customer_reviews.title: Going on 2 years and no issues
customer_reviews.text: I use this monitor probably 14 hours a day between work, research, finances and streaming movies with my wife and I have never had an issue. We have it teamed up with a workhorse desktop (I'm in IT and I work from home) and a THX stereo system, so most of the time we sit in my office and watch this instead of the theater room downstairs. Honestly it's the best monitor I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Fetherolf

customer_reviews.title: For the price compared to similar monitors is great if you can manage to get one with a ...
customer_reviews.text: ordered had a dead pixel sent it back to amazon. 2nd one had a dark pixel. For the price compared to similar monitors is great if you can manage to get one with a good screen. If ur getting this for the freesync u will need a display cable for it to work, hdmi doesnt. Thing went on sale for 40$ off days after i ordered so i contacted amazon. They wouldnt price match their stuff but i complained enough to get a 20$ gift card so that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: corry

customer_reviews.title: ... wobble people complain about is real and can be annoying. In also have a bit of back light ...
customer_reviews.text: The wobble people complain about is real and can be annoying. In also have a bit of back light bleed, but I am so used to this that I don't notice anymore. Even with it's flaws it is the best monitor I have ever owned. Great picture quality, affordable, and games in ultra wide look amazing. I also really like the freesync it works way better than I imagined it would. For the money you can't get a better display!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: 3 Years Old - Monitor is going out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor almost exactly 3 years ago. I have been happy with it since that time. Now it is going out. The color changes throughout the day as I work on it. This is my at-home work computer monitor. It isn't used constantly but is used quite a bit. I'm disappointed, but I know the warranty was only for 1 year. Time to research and buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Double monitors without the gap!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my boyfriend, and he is absolutely in love with it. It's basically having two monitors without the gap in the middle! The curve makes it very easy to see the whole screen without unnecessary head movements. The quality is crystal clear, and I would occasionally steal time on his computer just to enjoy a movie or simply browse the web.
customer_reviews.author: Jay G.

customer_reviews.title: Better for watching movies than doing detailed work.
customer_reviews.text: The screen is mostly well-designed and has a hefty weight to it. It can be hard to tilt the screen precisely. The screen is not ultra high resolution, so is less adequate for super detailed editing.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Great picture quality!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by the quality and size. Tiny bit of corner glow on bottom corners only, but only visible on very dark backgrounds. Good stand too.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Best LG ultrawide
customer_reviews.text: I have this and the 29 inch LG Ultrawide, this has a "Softer" picture quality than the 29 inch Ultrawide, but it's well worth it purely for the size. For gaming it can't be beat. Movies are about the same between the 2, and same with multitasking, but for gaming this is God tier. Why 1080? Frames per second. Why 75Hz? Because 144 needs a monster pc. If you are interested in Ultrawide for gaming, this is the one you want because the 29 inch doesn't get you as immersed as the 34 does. Buy it, it's totally worth it. Picture attached has this monitor on the bottom and the 29 inch on top with a movie going.
customer_reviews.author: Dan S.

customer_reviews.title: Using for work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work. Most of my company uses dual monitors but I've always be a fan of 1 larger monitor. My old monitor, which I loved, was a 27' Samsung but I wanted something bigger. I was going to buy another standard monitor but bigger and didn't want to spend too much. After days of browsing and reading reading reviews I pulled the trigger on this one. I LOVE IT! Colors are great, size is perfect (fits 2 pages of excel side by side perfectly) and the price was not crazy! BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Krzywozycki

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less than a week!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a dud.. but I used this for less than a week and then it would not power on, sent it back to LG 30 days ago and still have not gotten a new one, or even a response from LG, terrible customer service, I am NOT too happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: MLN

customer_reviews.title: Unreal.  Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor kills it. I honestly cannot express how amazing the Freesync technology improves gaming - the smoothness. Gracious, the smoothness. It seriously feels like a brand new PC; games "run" better and feel like they have new life. It's truly a game-changer and I'd recommend investing in this monitor technology over a crazy expensive GPU, which wouldn't even get you the SMOOTHNESS that this provides. Did I mention the smoothness? Plus, the 21:9 ratio is incredibly immersive on this size of a screen. 1080p is still in its glory days and for a 34" (thirty-four!!! I love living in the future) at this price point (thanks Amazon Prime Day) you honestly cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: This is my second. That says it all.
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor more than my life. Would I like it a little bigger? Sure. Curved? Kinda. Would I love I higher refresh rate? You bet. But for the money, you can NOT beat this thing. With this resolution, onscreen real estate AND Freesync? You can't buy a better monitor for the price. I don't think you can get a better one for even $400 or $500.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: A disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has been a disappointment. Not only do I have to crane my neck to see the sides but it has flickered on and off since Day One. LG said to try new cables. I did — three times. I switched monitors and didn't have the same problem. This monitor will often black out 30 or more times a day. Jiggling the cable will sometimes make it come back on; other times it powers off into sleep mode, despite not being in sleep mode. I'm sorry I bought it. The blackout problems are getting to be more trouble than they're worth and I'm going to end up going back to using two monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Cajuneer

customer_reviews.title: Great for work!
customer_reviews.text: This has made working from home MUCH more enjoyable. I absolutely love this monitor and want to get 2 more actually lol Color quality is great, text is crystal clear, response rate seems phenomenal. Only thing I wish was it was more than 1080p but at this price point it is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: KYTwinsDad

customer_reviews.title: Easily recommended for someone who uses a dual monitor system
customer_reviews.text: Crystal clear picture and works very well with games. Arrived with zero issues/dead pixels. I cant comment too much on the integrated speakers as I use a headset. Easily recommended for someone who uses a dual monitor system! My second monitor is a 24" and serves its purpose as my web browsing monitor while this one displays games and main programs. Video card: GTX 1070
customer_reviews.author: Shawna C.

customer_reviews.title: So far LOVING this new monitor
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of engineering and design work, and this monitor works great for that. I can't so much on gaming as that is not really a hobby of mine, but I am sure it would be great for that too. I use it as a split screen most of the time when needing to work in different apps at once. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Monitor worked out great for me.
customer_reviews.text: I did no pixel testing or lighting test. Basically no panel test. No obvious damage for a laymen and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Monitor has been great, very sharp, used for office documents as well as internet browsing - haven't tried gaming on it I did try 2 inputs at same time on screen - Desktop PC and Laptop PC, took a little effort, but I got it to work, that said, it wasn't really useful for me. So I am back to switching back and forth between input 1 and input 2
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Sincerely this monitor was the best purchase I made in the past two years!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this monitor daily for two years. Everything from watching movies, to editing photos and playing games. Hands down my favorite monitor. Love the ultra wide format, the black levels and colors are on point, it replaced three 25" monitors and I couldn't be happier with this even after 2 years!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Gilman

customer_reviews.title: Finally a monitor that works flawlessly with my MacBook
customer_reviews.text: After a few different monitors that I tried, this one was finally compatible with my MacBook Pro. Other monitors took forever to be recognized, if at all. This one instantly works, just plugged and played. Added bonus, did not realize that it came with speakers! If anyone is having trouble with MacBook compatible monitors, choose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Cpt. America

customer_reviews.title: love the screen area
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a year and am still amazed at the clarity, and the size is so handy it will probably be heading to the office as soon a I can replace it. :) It woks fantastic, but it sounds like it would be even better with AMD. I would give this 5 stars if it was made for NVIDIA graphic cards. I am very glad I purchased the LG 34 :)
customer_reviews.author: Elsee D.

customer_reviews.title: Minor issues, otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and they are great. Very nice big monitors and a big upgrade from my previous setup. The only problem is that there is a dead pixel on one of them, and the stand allows you to adjust the monitor up and down. One of the stands allows 100% adjustment, while the other one has about 80% adjustment, it just won't go all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Review Guru

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a good monitor but didn't last
customer_reviews.text: After having the monitor for 6 months it suddenly stopped working and doesn't appear to turn anymore despite the light in the front indicating that it is receiving power. I liked the monitor but very disappointed that it doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.author: Josh Friedman

customer_reviews.title: My wife loved the idea of an ultrawide
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved the idea of an ultrawide, so I surprised her with this. She loves it, and it's pretty cool to see her game while having a chat app and video all going at once.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect monitor no tearing in gaming.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using for a few weeks now and and it had a beautiful picture and there have been no issues. The split screen software works flawless. The only issue i had was the cd would now read in any of my computers so i just downloaded the software. Its basically 2 24inch monitors built into 1. I would recommend to anyone thinking about a 21:9 monitor, for me its the perfect size the 29inch would have been on the little small side. There is no tearing in game. I am running it with the Asus ROG RX480.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought a partially used one that had some cosmetic damage on the back. Was well worth the $100 I saved, this screen is amazing. It works well with my 3D modeling program and gives me huge amounts of visual space to manipulate my models. As for gaming, it's nice having such a wide view that I couldn't get before. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking to purchase a wide screen monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Noriega

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor, but.....
customer_reviews.text: It's a good monitor, but the problem is when you start getting to this size you start to notice the pixels, this monitor would be perfect if it was 1440p
customer_reviews.author: Braheem

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Pros -Great build quality. -Height adjustment is great. The height can easily be adjust with one hand, and there's a good height variance. Cons -None so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great For Editing!! AMAZING FOR GAMING
customer_reviews.text: Made editing on Adobe Priemier cc so much more productive. With the crazy long time line and big viewing screen. Gaming on this bad boy in 2560x1080 looks amazing just have a grapgics card that candle that and ultra setting and amazed. 75mhz refresh rate looks killer doom and slime rancher ftw!!
customer_reviews.author: Skull Crusher Adventures

customer_reviews.title: I also play games and watch movies on it where it is great at that
customer_reviews.text: Had it's for over 3 weeks and it has met all of my expectations. I mainly use it for music production in ableton which it is phenomenal for! I also play games and watch movies on it where it is great at that too
customer_reviews.author: Chirs

customer_reviews.title: Like two monitors with half the wires
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a new monitor to work from home on but didn’t want all the additional wires that a dual setup would require. This monitor fits my needs and an extremely competitive cost. Dual browsers/apps snap cleanly next to each other just like I was using two monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Springer Dinger

customer_reviews.title: Need a PC with a special graphics card
customer_reviews.text: You need a PC with a special graphics card to use the expanded width screen. I wish this was more prominently explained as I would have ordered the standard width otherwise. Other than that, it's OK.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Z

customer_reviews.title: It could only be better if it were 4K at this price
customer_reviews.text: It could only be better if it were 4K at this price. Great for productivity, watching movies and games. Speakers are okay but any decent pair of external speakers even in the $50 range dramatically improve sound quality. Or you can use a good set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer AV

customer_reviews.title: Aswesome screen
customer_reviews.text: Awesome screen. I use it for gaming and it is great. If you intend to use it for gaming check if your games support 21:9 increasing the field of view. Using it in wondows 10. It has an app where you can change its settings directly from the pc, that is soo awesome. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: F. Melo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: First impressions it's big I can from a 24inch monitor. The colors seem to be on point and I'm not getting any backlight leakage like the others. This screen is beautiful I love the split screen option I can play Xbox and be on my PC at the same time. Wish I had a PC with freesync my model GPU was the last one made without freesync guess I have to upgrade
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Damaged drivers disc and small scratches.
customer_reviews.text: Received the monitor and open the box, owner's/drivers disc is cracked seeming like someone stabbed the disc with a knife. Did was also not in any sorry if packaging at all, just sitting on top of everything. All other packaging looked normal. Pull out the monitor and there is a series of small scratches in the bottom right corner. Also, the panel inside the monitor that the screws go into to attach the base was badly aligned. I managed to take a small Flathead screwdriver and align that back up. Other than that, initial hookup and usage looks great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Aznnomness

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of screen space to replace two monitors
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. I prefer this to two smaller monitors side by side. This monitor looks great and provides plenty of screen for multiple windows or stretching one window wide across the whole screen. Great for spreadsheets, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gross

customer_reviews.title: Stocks
customer_reviews.text: I put this up to house my broker window. Very awesome for the price. Id attach my photo but broker screens usually have some info i dont want all Amazon to see.
customer_reviews.author: C. Erekson

customer_reviews.title: Power Issues
customer_reviews.text: Just a few months outside the warranty my monitor stopped turning on and the power button's light was very dim. I wasted money buying a couple replacement power supplies thinking it was the block. It's certainly the screen for whatever reason just stopped working. The cost to fix is is better spent on a new monitor, which won't be an LG.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Iaccarino

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is amazing. For the price
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is amazing. For the price, I wasn't really expecting to be blown away, but wow. The resolution matches an RX 480 perfectly. I can play all of my games at Epic/Ultra settings and get 60-120fps with ease. If you're waffling, go for it, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Windows 10 beware
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, the disc with the software and drivers did not work with my Windows 10 laptop but i was able to download everything from the website and install the drivers via Device Manager. Love this monitor otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ended up returning this monitor, but great customer service from BeachCamera
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of programming and other things outside of watching movies or playing games. That being said, this monitor did not work out for me as a higher resolution was a must. I sent an email to beach camera, and they emailed me a return sticker and I had a full refund just a few days later. A great overall experience, thanks beach camera!
customer_reviews.author: mrsiesta

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works great. I have two separate PC's hooked up to it, one Desktop for home and one laptop for work, and I can quickly and easily switch between those two PC's with two clicks of a bottom on the bottom front of the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great to be rid of multiple monitors
customer_reviews.text: I first had this monitor hung on the wall. Once I decided to try the stand it came with, I was extremely surprised with the sheer quality of the stand. The tilt and height adjustments work beautifully. I'm a computer science major and main purpose was more screen room without needing multiple monitors. This does the trick for sure. I've watched a few movies on it just to see and the quality of the picture blew me away. The only real drawback I see in this, and it's the only thing that stuck out so far, is the chime it makes when you turn the monitor on. It sounds like an error message.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. Got one and then bought another about two months later. That's a pretty good indicator that the first one was sufficiently impressive. Plus, for the money, it was the best deal I could find.
customer_reviews.author: Greg W

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor! I use it with my Mac touchbar laptop to design posters and videos. Just make sure your color settings match so you can see the right colors for printing.
customer_reviews.author: Lyss_lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Had a little bit of an ordeal color-matching it to my other monitor, but since that's done, it's been doing great for a while now. It's almost like two monitors in one.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Developed  lines after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: The first monitor I received died after a week and was replaced quickly by amazon. The second monitor has lasted 3 years. Harsh horizontal and vertical lines showed up out of nowhere. I liked this monitor while it worked, but the reliability has been unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Markp

customer_reviews.title: Photographer
customer_reviews.text: Im a Photographer and this monitor is perfect for photo editing. Its seriously perfect. The color accuracy is amazing. Highly recommend this amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Juan R.

customer_reviews.title: Great looking screen
customer_reviews.text: Great looking screen. Very high resolution - - BUT your machine does need to be able to support that resolution. Check your drivers first. Has installable feature that let's you pick the screen arrangement of up to four screens. My favorite is one half on the left and two stacked one quarters on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer JH

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it a few months, no issues and I’m very happy with the overall performance.
customer_reviews.author: NonSeq

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Got this refurbished and works great. I don't game but use it for office use and watching YouTube and is a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W

customer_reviews.title: great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy base, looks fantastic, no dead pixels. If you want to unlock the 75hz refresh rate you need to go into your video card driver utility. In my case was Nvidia. Go in there and create a custom resolution and set a manual refresh rate. Played a few games and have less tearing with those extra hz turned on!
customer_reviews.author: Greg A.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great monitor for the price. I’ve had it for a few months now and have no issues. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ashton Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Big productivity booster
customer_reviews.text: Really really like having a large monitor like this, over dual monitors. Not very impressed with the resolution. Wish I had invested more.
customer_reviews.author: Webspinman

customer_reviews.title: Great for running Music DAW
customer_reviews.text: I use Studio One 4.5 and this lets me see everything I need to see without scrolling around.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. I ordered this monitor as a gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. He keeps commenting on how amazing the colors are in game. He says it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: I really like it -- very affordable option
customer_reviews.text: I really like the wide screen aspect. I often use it as a split screen and it works great. I think it's easier to mount a single monitor and have it off the desk and open up work space.
customer_reviews.author: Riemer55

customer_reviews.title: VERY happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: VERY happy with this purchase. EXCELLENT Value for the price AND highly rated (without regard to price) by PC Magazine tests. I LOVE this monitor!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Dearborne

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is dope
customer_reviews.text: From CoD, to Overwatch to WoW, to simple applications like Visio & Powerpoint...and then for you engineers and tech nerds - MobaX, Putty and even native Windows CLI look clear and not hard on the eyes. I dig this monitor and would buy another if the price were right. Ubuntu Konsole/Terminal look as good as green on black can be. =)
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is a CPA and often has work to ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a CPA and often has work to do at home on her company laptop. I bought this for her as a surprise and she raves about it every time we talk. The ability to open multiple spreadsheets, and actually be able to read them, has improved her productivity and eased the stress on her eyes. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Frank Haze

customer_reviews.title: Would buy this again and again.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS MONITOR. I purchased 2 one for my boss and one for myself. It's like having two monitors without taking up my entire desk. I have this same model at home as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Arsenal

customer_reviews.title: I like only having 1
customer_reviews.text: Makes using a single monitor possible again. I use 3 monitors at work, but at home, I like only having 1. This is wide enough to put tools on one side and still view my work. It also does well with two programs on the screen at once, side by side. Text is not as sharp as I would have liked. I might upgrade to a better ultrawide later and move this one to my gaming rig.
customer_reviews.author: LinckG

customer_reviews.title: Happy With the Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this monitor for work, to display multiple pages at once. Works great! Easy assembly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased this monitor.
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this monitor because of complaints about the screen resolution close up. Now that I have the monitor sitting on my desk, I'm happy I made the purchase. It's huge and it looks great. It's a steal for under $400.
customer_reviews.author: Home Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I work nine hours a day on my laptop, this monitor is amazing. With the split screen technology it's like have two to four monitors. The resolution and colors are spectacular. 12/1 update, the height adjustment keeps lowering it's self every time I bump my desk. Even a very small bump it lowers, If I want to keep it in place I have have something under it. It has to be a design flaw. LG what can you do for this problem? Switch it out with a better designed stand please.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: we have purchased 3 of these for staff and they have met our expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy H

customer_reviews.title: The back is very very delicate plastic
customer_reviews.text: The screen is nice, but for what I paid I am not happy that the back of the unit is all marked up, My old monitor broke so I cannot return this one and wait for a new one, so I guess I have to just keep it as is with a punch of scratches on the rear of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: dalwe lasher

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my office PC. It's really nice to have one monitor that is about as wide as two 19" ones. I can split screen work and improve productivity, plus the picture is razor sharp!
customer_reviews.author: DunRite Networks

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: For my purposes the extra room that the 34 inches offer create numerous conveniences. I am just a search the web stream some video guy and this monitor works for me and I am satisfied with the cost.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey ethan berumen

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good picture quality and sound quality. Replace 2 24inch monitor with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jun Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I f'n LOVE this monitor. It's great if you are a gamer or edit videos like me :P
customer_reviews.author: Casey Donegan

customer_reviews.title: Just received, nice!
customer_reviews.text: Ariived in good condition. Just getting used to it now, so far very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Airkahuna

customer_reviews.title: Love his. I can tilt it and adjust the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love his. I can tilt it and adjust the height. I live the built in speakers that work very well and decently loud for monitor speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: ... 60-75Hz I know there are people out there with better stats but I think this monitor is super
customer_reviews.text: 2560x1080 is the resolution at 60-75Hz I know there are people out there with better stats but I think this monitor is super!
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality and size are great for the price. Using it to work at home, not for gaming.
customer_reviews.author: CSsrl

customer_reviews.title: I like it and it has a great color on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it has a great color on the screen and it’s very clear on looking at sites on the internet and I like the speakers on because, they sound very good!
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Huge bright, sharp screen and easy to split into individual windows.
customer_reviews.author: Catfish Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Really nice 21:9 1080 monitor
customer_reviews.text: Really nice monitor. The choice of 21:9 lg monitors largely comes down to the resolution that is best for your eyes and monitor usage. I am returning this monitor for the lg 34um88c-p for the higher resolution. I would highly suggest this monitor if 1440 is too small for you.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Need more pixels
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good monitor for less graphics games This monitor really needs some more pixels in it but overall all really good
customer_reviews.author: isiah Carroll

customer_reviews.title: No idea about gaming but if you want a bigger clear monitor it is fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: It’s my new monitor at work. The picture is fabulous and clear as can be!!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Scott

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clear and bright image quality. Works very well for gaming too! Dont get me started on 21:9 movies.. amazing!
customer_reviews.author: RetroDesign3D

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases ive made so far
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases ive made so far, many ultra wide monitors are over the $500 range, and this one is also very good for gaming, great refresh rate, I overclocked mine to 120 hz, great for productivity
customer_reviews.author: David Baginskiy

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the view
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has great options for screen splitting and dusplays a crisp picture. However it does not meet the advertised refresh rate with Freesync(Usually just below 60) and the soind isn't the best( adequate for a monitor though, which should never be ypur promary source of audio)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: the best i have so far. I love it. I use for personal computer and what an image..
customer_reviews.author: Pierre TinelTop Contributor: Photography

product_meta.title: LG 34UM68-P 34-Inch 21:9 UltraWide IPS Monitor with FreeSync
product_meta.description: Style:Height Adjustable| Size:34 InchThe UltraWide 21:9 aspect ratio makes games and movies more immersive than ever. The clarity of 1080p pixel Full HD resolution with IPS is a game-changer. Simply put, from any viewing angle, everything looks more crisp and detailed in Full HD. The brightness is 300 cd/m2
feature_bullets: 34 inches Full HD IPS LED Monitor (Diagonal) sRGB over 99percent; Pixel Pitch (mm) 0.312 millimeter x 0.310 millimeter
8bits, 16.7 Million Colors, 5ms GTG Response Time.OS Compatibility Windows
75 Hertz Refresh Rate, 21:9 Aspect Ratio,2560x1080 Resolution, 5M:1 Contrast Ratio
DIMENSIONS : Without Stand (WxHxD) : 32.7 x 15 x 1.9 inches,With Stand (WxHxD) : (Down) 32.7 x 16.9 x 9.4 inches, (Up)32.7 x21.6 x9.4 inches
178/178 Viewing Angle, Adjustable Stand for Height and Tilt
